channel.title: edge vm on DefinIT
channel.description: Recent content in edge vm on DefinIT

item.title: NSX-T 2.0 Lab Build: Transport Zones and Transport Nodes
item.description: Disclaimer! I am learning NSX-T, part of my learning is to deploy in my lab - if I contradict the official docs then go with the docs! Lab Environment This NSX-T lab environment is built as a nested lab on my physical hosts. There are four physical ESXi hosts, onto which I will deploy three ESXi VMs, a vCenter Server Appliance, NSX Manager, an NSX Controller cluster, and two NSX Edge Nodes.
